attributes.action: Stop All ISIS Fighters Returning & those who have, to be Tried for War Crimes.
attributes.background: The British government now estimates that as many as 900 Britons have headed to Syria to fight for ISIS and recently that half of those could now be back in the UK ready to commit Jihad & as such are a National Security Threat.

rejection.details:
Trials for war crimes are the responsibility of the International Criminal Court (ICC). You can find out more about the ICC here:

https://www.icc-cpi.int/en_menus/icc/Pages/default.aspx
